ASCII-Art of the above (q=query, e=event):
Add support for
Add support for Python 3.5 and Python 3.6 on Zope 4. While dropping support for older Zope versions. [icemac, 2018-07-11]
trans-unit.target: 在Zope 4上增加对Python 3.5和Python 3.6的支持。同时放弃对旧版Zope的支持。[icemac,2018-07-11]

trans-unit.source: Consider objects with a daterange start and end. Use this addon to query all objects inside a query-start and query-end range, where either or both of objects start and end match the query range.
trans-unit.target: 考虑有daterange开始和结束的对象。使用这个add-on来查询查询开始和结束范围内的所有对象,其中任何一个或两个对象的开始和结束都符合查询范围。

trans-unit.source: Contributors
Copyright (c) 2007-2016, BlueDynamics Alliance, Austria All rights reserved.
Example: You want all events within a date range of next two weeks, neither if the event has started one week ago nor ends one week later - or both.
trans-unit.target: 例子:您希望所有的事件都在未来两周的日期范围内,既不希望事件在一周前开始,也不希望事件在一周后结束,或者两者都有。

trans-unit.target: 修正Python 3的exportimport.py (GenericSetup),并将Python 3.7添加到测试矩阵中 [MrTango]。

trans-unit.source: Remove dependency from
Source Code
THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY BlueDynamics Alliance
The
The index acts as an proxy for a more complex query on two indexes (DateIndex on ZCatalog or FieldIndex on zope.catalog). It utilize the other indexes and does not store any index-data itself.
trans-unit.target: 该索引作为两个索引(ZCatalog上的DateIndex或zope.catalog上的FieldIndex)上更复杂查询的代理。它利用其他的索引,而自己不存储任何索引数据。

trans-unit.source: The sources are in a GIT DVCS with its main branches at github.
trans-unit.target: The sources are in a GIT DVCS with its main branches at github.

trans-unit.source: There are two types of indexes available:
trans-unit.target: 有两种类型的索引可供选择。

trans-unit.source: This index is possibly the fastest way to solve the problem, it solves it as an zope index and works direct with the catalogs fast IISets (or IFSets). Its much faster than formerly used classical catalog-query post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 这个索引可能是最快的解决问题的方法,它以zope索引的方式解决这个问题,并直接与目录快速IISets(或IFSets)一起工作。其速度比以前使用的经典目录查询后处理快得多。

trans-unit.source: This will find objects (consider start is always before end date):
trans-unit.target: 这将找到对象(考虑开始日期总是在结束日期之前)。

trans-unit.source: To illustrate this a query example on ZCatalog):
trans-unit.target: 为了说明这一点,ZCatalog上的一个查询示例)。)

trans-unit.source: We’d be happy to see many commits, forks and pull-requests to make DateRangeInRangeIndex even better.
trans-unit.target: We’d be happy to see many commits, forks and pull-requests to make DateRangeInRangeIndex even better.

trans-unit.source: Zalán Somogyváry [SyZn]
